movies.title: Den orolige mannen
movies.plot: Wallander forgets his gun in a bar and is suspended. With time on his hands, he looks into the disappearance of his daughter's father-in-law who may have been involved in the death of a young sailor during an international incident back in the '80's with a submarine entering Swedish waters.
movies.simplePlot: Wallander forgets his gun in a bar and is suspended. With time on his hands, he looks into the disappearance of his daughter's father-in-law who may have been involved in the death of a ...

biography.bio: Krister Henriksson was born on November 12, 1946 in Häverö, Stockholms län, Sweden as Jan Krister Allan Henriksson. He is an actor and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Reconstruction (2003) and Infidèle (2000). He has been married to Cecilia Nilsson since 1988. They have one child.
biography.name: Krister Henriksson

biography.bio: Charlotta Jonsson is an actress, known for Sjätte dagen (1999), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arne Dahl: Eye in the Sky (2015).
biography.name: Charlotta Jonsson

biography.bio: Leonard Terfelt was born in 1976. He is an actor, known for Jalla! Jalla! (2000), Leo (2007) and Oskyldigt dömd (2008).
biography.name: Leonard Terfelt

biography.bio: Signe Dahlkvist is an actress, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), 10 000 timmar (2014) and The Nurse (2014).
biography.name: Signe Dahlkvist

biography.bio: Marika Lindström was born on November 25, 1946. She is an actress, known for Daybreak (2003), En busslast kärlek (2010) and Fifi Brindacier (1997).
biography.name: Marika Lindström

biography.bio: Sten Ljunggren was born on October 16, 1938 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor and director, known for Talk (1997), Together (2000) and The Temptation of St. Tony (2009). He is married to Barbro Oborg.
biography.name: Sten Ljunggren

biography.bio: Peter Andersson was born on February 12, 1953 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden as Ulf Harry Peter Andersson. He is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), The Girl Who Played with Fire (2009) and Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit (2014).
biography.name: Peter Andersson

biography.bio: Ingvar Hirdwall was born on December 5, 1934 in Stockholm, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo (2009), Beck (1997) and Tomtemaskinen (1993). He is married to Marika Lindström.
biography.name: Ingvar Hirdwall

biography.bio: Len Cariou was born on September 30, 1939 in Winnipeg, Manitoba, Canada as Leonard Joseph Cariou. He is an actor, known for Blue Bloods (2010), Prisoners (2013) and Secret Window (2004). He has been married to Heather Summerhayes since October 25, 1986. He was previously married to Susan Kapilow and Patricia Otter.
biography.name: Len Cariou

biography.bio: Douglas Johansson was born on January 31, 1960. He is an actor, known for The Impossible (2012), Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005) and Arn: The Knight Templar (2007).
biography.name: Douglas Johansson

biography.bio: Mats Bergman was born on May 5, 1948 in Gothenburg, Västra Götalands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Evil (2003) and Den ofrivillige golfaren (1991).
biography.name: Mats Bergman

biography.bio: Fredrik Gunnarsson was born on September 4, 1965 in Oxelösund, Östergötlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Show Me Love (1998) and Lycka till och ta hand om varandra (2012).
biography.name: Fredrik Gunnarsson

biography.bio: Malena Engström was born on April 3, 1967 in Västerås, Sweden as Inger Ester Malena Engström. She is an actress, known for Brott§våg (2000), Beautiful Fall (2004) and The Reunion (2002).
biography.name: Malena Engström

biography.bio: Marianne Mörck was born on September 2, 1949 in Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Wallander: enquêtes criminelles (2005), Credo (1997) and Hon jazzade en sommar (2003).
biography.name: Marianne Mörck

biography.bio: Sven Ahlström was born on July 4, 1966 in Malmö, Skåne län, Sweden as Sven Johan Ahlström. He is an actor, known for Call Girl (2012), Mysteriet på Greveholm - Grevens återkomst (2012) and Sound of Noise (2010).
biography.name: Sven Ahlström
